headline.print_headline: Raytheon Links With Poland's WB Electronics in Missile Shield Bid
headline.main: Raytheon Links With Poland's WB Electronics in Missile Shield Bid

docs.snippet: U.S. weapons maker Raytheon has signed a letter of intent with Polish military software producer WB Electronics to cooperate in bidding for a contract to build Poland's planned anti-missile system, Polish state radio said on its website....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. weapons maker Raytheon has signed a letter of intent with Polish military software producer WB Electronics to cooperate in bidding for a contract to build Poland's planned anti-missile system, Polish state radio said on its website.

headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Rohingya Could Face Detention Under Myanmar Draft Plan
headline.main: Exclusive: Rohingya Could Face Detention Under Myanmar Draft Plan

docs.snippet: Myanmar's national government has drafted a plan that will give around a million members of the persecuted Rohingya Muslim ethnic minority a bleak choice: accept ethnic reclassification and the prospect of citizenship, or be detained....
docs.lead_paragraph: Myanmar's national government has drafted a plan that will give around a million members of the persecuted Rohingya Muslim ethnic minority a bleak choice: accept ethnic reclassification and the prospect of citizenship, or be detained.

headline.print_headline: Exclusive-Rohingya Could Face Detention Under Myanmar Draft Plan
headline.main: Exclusive-Rohingya Could Face Detention Under Myanmar Draft Plan

docs.snippet: Myanmar's national government has drafted a plan that will give around a million members of the persecuted Rohingya Muslim ethnic minority a bleak choice: accept ethnic reclassification and the prospect of citizenship, or be detained....
docs.lead_paragraph: Myanmar's national government has drafted a plan that will give around a million members of the persecuted Rohingya Muslim ethnic minority a bleak choice: accept ethnic reclassification and the prospect of citizenship, or be detained.

headline.print_headline: AZ Almaar Appoint Van Den Brom as New Coach
headline.main: AZ Almaar Appoint Van Den Brom as New Coach

docs.snippet: AZ Alkmaar have appointed John van den Brom as their new coach, the former midfielder replacing Marco van Basten, who gave up the job because of health issues....
docs.lead_paragraph: AZ Alkmaar have appointed John van den Brom as their new coach, the former midfielder replacing Marco van Basten, who gave up the job because of health issues.

headline.print_headline: Records Fall as Europe Lead by Point After Birdie Blitz
headline.main: Records Fall as Europe Lead by Point After Birdie Blitz

docs.snippet: The United States pegged Europe's lead back to one point after an extraordinary exhibition of shotmaking in a record-breaking morning fourball session at the 40th Ryder Cup on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States pegged Europe's lead back to one point after an extraordinary exhibition of shotmaking in a record-breaking morning fourball session at the 40th Ryder Cup on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Somali Militants Stone Woman to Death
headline.main: Somali Militants Stone Woman to Death

docs.snippet: Somali al Shabaab militants stoned a woman to death in the southern town of Barawe on Friday after a court they had set up declared her guilty of adultery, the militants and witnesses said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Somali al Shabaab militants stoned a woman to death in the southern town of Barawe on Friday after a court they had set up declared her guilty of adultery, the militants and witnesses said.

headline.print_headline: Hundreds of Small Earthquakes Hit Central California
headline.main: Hundreds of Small Earthquakes Hit Central California

docs.snippet: More than 500 small earthquakes struck a volcanic region in central California on Thursday and Friday, posing no immediate risk, federal environmental officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 500 small earthquakes struck a volcanic region in central California on Thursday and Friday, posing no immediate risk, federal environmental officials said.

headline.sub: Mas signs decree calling for independence referendum
headline.main: Mas signs decree calling for independence referendum

docs.snippet: The president of Catalonia in Spain has signed a decree calling for an independence referendum. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: The president of Catalonia in Spain has signed a decree calling for an independence referendum. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.print_headline: Houthi Rebels Attack Yemen Security Chief's Home
headline.main: Houthi Rebels Attack Yemen Security Chief's Home

docs.snippet: Shi'ite Muslim rebels attacked the home of Yemen's intelligence chief in Sanaa on Saturday, residents and security sources said, showing the fragility of a power-sharing accord that has failed to halt fighting in the capital....
docs.lead_paragraph: Shi'ite Muslim rebels attacked the home of Yemen's intelligence chief in Sanaa on Saturday, residents and security sources said, showing the fragility of a power-sharing accord that has failed to halt fighting in the capital.

headline.print_headline: Legends, Sandals and Sweat, Spartathlon Ticks All Boxes
headline.main: Legends, Sandals and Sweat, Spartathlon Ticks All Boxes

docs.snippet: From a daring attempt by a group of friends to one of the most iconic endurance races in the world, the 246-km Spartathlon has defied the downturn in Greek sports, drawing record numbers as ultra marathons become more popular....
docs.lead_paragraph: From a daring attempt by a group of friends to one of the most iconic endurance races in the world, the 246-km Spartathlon has defied the downturn in Greek sports, drawing record numbers as ultra marathons become more popular.
